UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Bioinorganic chemistry of calcitermin - the picklock of its antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Bellotti D, Toniolo M, Dudek D, Mikolajczyk A, Guerrini R, Matera-Witkiewicz A, Remelli M, Rowinska-Zyrek M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=128µg/ml)
